name: Magneto (MrTestOne)
description:
Timing, skill, patience - that's all it needs!

Use your magnetic force in the perfect moment to bounce your balls higher and higher!

Controls: Space (or Mouse/Pointer Click)

Time: 60 seconds

Online Highscore: powered by Lootlocker

Made in ~48hrs, using Unity and some assets:

  • Custom developed framework
  • Some paid assets like audio, icons,...
  • UltEvents Free (AssetStore)
  • MMFeedbacks Free (GitHub)

Developed for ScoreSpace Jam #18
